mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `aa`.`licaiquan_article` (id, title, creator_login_name, checker_login_name, author, section, source, carousel, thumb, show_picture, content, created_time, updated_time, deleted,timing_time) VALUE (#{id}, #{title}, #{creatorLoginName}, #{checkerLoginName}, #{author}, #{section}, #{source}, #{carousel}, #{thumb}, #{showPicture}, #{content}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{deleted},#{timingTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE `aa`.`licaiquan_article` SET deleted = TRUE WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, creator_login_name, checker_login_name, author, `section`, source, carousel, thumb, show_picture, content, created_time, updated_time, deleted, timing_time FROM `licaiquan_article` WHERE carousel = true AND show_picture is not NULL AND show_picture != '' AND deleted = false ORDER BY created_time DESC
